divs: Sighting DetailsI was working construction in plainfield illinois on tuesday morning around 11:00 am it was a clear day hardley any clouds at all very blue sky we were taking a break and there are a lot of air traffic in the area because we are close to chicago so I was looking up at the blue sky and I have polarized sunglasses on witch makes the sky even more blue.anyway I saw what I thought was another jet in the sky and it took me a second to relize it WAS NOT moving it was at very high alltitude I used the corner roofline of the house as a stationary object to gudge if this thing was moving and it was not, after about 10 seconds trying to see if it would move it zoomed out thats the best I can describe it like it zoomed out of the atmosphere. After I saw this I new it could not have been a airplain and still dont know what to think about what I saw it hade me looking up at the sky the rest of the day.
Summary: cigar or cylynder stationary at high alttitude zoomed out of atmosphere
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Plainfield
There were no other sightings in Plainfield on or around June 10th 2008
